description.para: Knowledge of a given area, including geographical and political knowledge. The Area lore skill is used when checking to see if a character has heard of a person, place or organisation. Area lore is nearly always based on intelligence.

There is an area lore skill for each area. The size of the area covered can vary greatly, from a single village to a whole world. A skill which covers a large area will be less detailed than one covering a small area. Size of areas can be a village, a hundred, shire, country, region, continent or world.

An item of knowledge at a given level may be known at higher levels, but the target number doubles at each increment. An area lore (village) at target 10 might tell you the name of the village's blacksmith, but the target would be 20 for area lore (hundred) and 40 for area lore (shire). Very specific knowledge about small areas will generally only be known if the right specific area lore skill is known.
The area lore that a character starts with will generally be based on either a village or hundred, unless they are well travelled.
Performing major operations on a wounded person. This requires some specialist tools (though rarely more complicated than sharp knives and tongs).

Care and treatment of wounds to the extent of stopping bleeding, and preventing infection. General first aid checks are made with intelligence, though some tasks, such as removing an arrow from a wound, use dexterity.

A first aid check may be made after someone has become injured, though only one first aid roll is allowed for a single set of injuries. A new first aid roll cannot be made until the subject has received more injuries.

A successful first aid check will stabalise a wound and allow it to begin healing naturally. Failure to perform first aid on a subject means that nightly healing rolls are not possible, and weekly checks are at +10 to the target difficulty.

If the subject is both stunned and wounded, seperate first aid rolls are required. If the first aid check is 10 or more points above the target required, then one level of stun or wound is also healed immediately. A character may try to first aid themselves, though they suffer all the normal penalties for being injured.

examples.example: First aid a bruised (1 stun) subject
First aid a dazed (2 stuns) subject
First aid a bloodied or battered (3-4 stuns) subject
First aid a beaten or oblivious (5-6 stuns) subject
First aid a hurt (1 wound) subject
First aid light or medium (2-3) wounds
First aid serious or critical (4-5) wounds

skill.name: Faerie lore
skill.description: Knowledge of the Other World, of faeries, spirits and beasts of supernatural nature. Based on intelligence.

skill.name: Folk lore
skill.description: Knowledge of stories, myths and legends of a people. Generally, everyone has basic folk lore knowledge of their own culture.

skill.name: Genealogy
skill.description: Knowledge of the family history of a given line, normally a noble house. Based on intelligence.

skill.name: Herb lore
skill.description: Knowledge of herbs and their properties. Can be used to recognise, collect and prepare herbs and plants for use in remedies, poisons and potions. Based on intelligence.

skill.name: History
skill.description: Knowledge of the past, especially the last few hundred years. Based on intelligence.

skill.name: Law
skill.description: Knowledge and understanding of the law, and how to apply it in a given situation. Based on intelligence.

skill.name: Religion
skill.description: Knowledge of a religion, including its gods, customs and rituals. Based on intelligence.

skill.name: Speak own
skill.description: The ability to speak your own language. This defaults to four. Language skills are very rarely rolled.

skill.name: Streetwise
skill.description: Knowledge of the seedier sides of civilisation, including being able to contact influential people, deal with the thieves guild, and understand how gangs and organised crime operates within a town or city.
skill.example: Locate the best place to find contacts
Make contact with the local thieves guild safely
Get a basic understanding of the underworld in a city after a day of investigation
